function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Promotion of telecommuting leading to increased health and organizational capacity","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased interactions in the workplace","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols for employees working on-site, promote vaccination, and provide regular testing for employees","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps, remote temperature monitoring devices","People":"Employees, employers, on-site workers","Owner":"Employers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"High levels of satisfaction with telecommuting","Impact":"Potential resistance to returning to on-site work, leading to prolonged remote work and prolonged absence of physical distancing measures","Mitigation":"Gradual return to on-site work, education on the importance of physical distancing, and regular communication on workplace safety measures","Technologies":"Communication platforms, scheduling software, remote work monitoring tools","People":"Employees, employers, public health authorities","Owner":"Employers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Low levels of satisfaction with telecommuting","Impact":"Decreased mental well-being and job satisfaction, leading to potential negative impacts on health","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support, improve remote work conditions, and facilitate social interaction among remote workers","Technologies":"Mental health apps, telemedicine platforms, virtual team-building tools","People":"Remote workers, employers, mental health professionals","Owner":"Employers, mental health professionals"}]}
